text: Rezső Bálint (October 22, 1874 – May 23, 1929) was a Hungarian neurologist and psychiatrist. He discovered Bálint's syndrome.Rezsö (Rudolf) Bálint (www.whonamedit.com) Bálint studied medicine in Budapest, graduating in 1897. He habilitated in 1910, became extraordinary professor in 1914 and full professor in 1917. He died of thyroid cancer in 1929. ==References== Category:1874 births Category:1929 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Hungary Category:Deaths from thyroid cancer Category:Neurologists Category:Scientists from Budapest Category:Psychiatrists
